tool_description:
This API is really helpful if you want to extract emails or phone numbers from any website without any challenges or coding issues.
This API is one of the finest and least expensive ones available, and it produces good and accurate results since it is built on very effective algorithms and precise regex.
Ahmed Elban developed this API.
# Currently, This API cannot handle JS and doesn't use proxies so if you intend to use it on a website using js or need proxies, it won't work
so please use cr...
name: Contact Scraper
title: Contact Scraper

api_list.name: Scrape Contact Details from a website
api_list.description: this endpoint will scrape emails and phones from any website using it`s URL

optional_parameters.name: exclude_emails
optional_parameters.description:
**If you want to scrape a website that displays many contacts or many profiles but there is an email or an email of the website appearing and you don't need it, The API won't return any of these emails if discovered on the website.**
***you can also input several emails separated by commas.***

optional_parameters.name: exclude_phones
optional_parameters.description:
**The API is helpful if you want to scrape a website that shows many contacts and many profiles but there is a phone number or the phone number of the website displayed on the page and you don't need it. You can enter many numbers separated by a comma. The API won't return any of these phone numbers if found on the website.**

### Please don't forget to quote the parameter if there are symbols like this

```
# before  +84. 24 3636 9512,+84) 914 261 828,+84. 24 3636 9371
unwanted_phones=\\\\\\\"%2B84. 24 3636 9512,%2B84) 914 261 828,%2B84. 24 3636 9371\\\\\\\"

```

optional_parameters.name: only_valid_phone_numbers
optional_parameters.description:
true means: check the phones numbers and return only those looks real
support two values
true and false
